page.title: 13INTERVIEW WITH FARMER cont.
page.content: The River Kym flows through the property & when in flood makes access difficult.Mail, bread, milk, & papers (Telegraph,News of the World,Hunts Post, Trader & Jackie) are left regularly in a box halfway to the main road. The family enjoy farm life, the fresh air & freedom of space. Mr.Campion plays tennis for a local club, his daughter likes riding, his son rifle shooting & his wife enjoys T.V. _ especially "Crossroads". They own several cars, a Land Rover & a black Labrador dog. Mr.Campion enjoys farming, the only disadvantages being the weather, some unsocial hours & the responsibility of decision making at different times. There is no active Farmer's Union in this area.
